casebody.data:
Isaac Michael GREEN, Petitioner, v. COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE, Respondent. Thomas Henry SMITH, Petitioner, v. COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE, Respondent. No. 7828. Circuit Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. April 9, 1935. Lloyd Dinkelspiel, of San Francisco, Cal., for petitioners. Frank J. Wideman, Asst. U. S. Atty. Gen., for respondent.

Before WILBUR, GARRECHT, and DENMAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Upon stipulation of counsel for respective parties that each of above causes has-been compromised and settled, ordered petition to review in each cause dismissed; mandates forthwith.
